backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Application - Under the Planning Act - 586 Eglinton Avenue East

noticeDescription:
NOTICE OF APPLICATION(S)

(Under the Planning Act)

 

The City has received the following application(s) under the Planning Act:

 

NORTH YORK COMMUNITY COUNCIL

 

Application Number: 24 164643 NNY 15 OZ

Application to Amend the Official Plan to permit replacement of office gross floor area in the proposal of the related application (Number 21 219614 NNY 15 OZ) to amend the Zoning By-law to allow a 32-storey building with dwelling units, 4021 sqm of office gross floor area, and 651 sqm of commercial-retail gross floor area.

586 Eglinton Avenue East

Ward 15 – Don Valley West

This land is also subject to applications under the Planning Act for an amendment to a Zoning By-Law (Application Number: 21 219614 NNY 15 OZ) and site plan control (Application Number: 21 237238 NNY 15 SA).

Planner, Jason Xie at 416-338-3004 or Jason.Xie@toronto.ca

 

 

CONTACT INFORMATION

 

City Clerk, Attention: Registrar Secretariat

Toronto City Hall, 2nd Floor West, 100 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, M5H 2N2,

Tel: 416-394-8101, Email: RegistrarCCO@toronto.ca

 

BACKGROUND INFORMATION

 

Background information and materials regarding the above-listed proposals are available at www.toronto.ca/city-government/planning-development/application-information-centre/.  

 

FURTHER INFORMATION

 

If you wish to receive notice regarding the progression of any of the proposed applications above, which include Official Plan amendment, proposed Draft Plan of Subdivision, Draft Plan of Common Elements Condominium, Vacant Land Condominium Application and/or proposed Zoning By-law amendment, you may make a request to the City Clerk, to the attention of the Registrar Secretariat, at the address or email noted above.
title: Notice of Application - Under the Planning Act - 586 Eglinton Avenue East
topics: Planning > Proposal for an Official Plan Amendment
